com.appscend.utilities

Class ProgressWheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.appscend.utilities.ProgressWheel

  • public class ProgressWheel
extends View
    An indicator of progress, similar to Android's ProgressBar. Can be used in 'spin mode' or 'increment mode'
    Author:
    Todd Davies Licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license see: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
